comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Depew is a village in Erie County, New York, United States. The population was 16,629 at the 2000 census. The name is derived from Chauncey Mitchell Depew, the President of the New York Central Railroad and former US Senator.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo was taken on June 9, 1911. That was the year in which Depew retired as U. S. Senator from New York, at the age of 85. Here he appears to be aboard a ship in the harbor, or perhaps on a ferry boat.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for bringing our attention to the date on this negative.  We'll add it to the description next time we update the record!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
